argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rngcrescrhm.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 2 |  | rngcrescrhm.c | |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | rngcrescrhm.r | |- ( ph -> R = ( Ring i^i U ) ) |
| 4 |  | rngcrescrhm.h | |- H = ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( x e. R <-> x e. ( Ring i^i U ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elinel1 | |- ( x e. ( Ring i^i U ) -> x e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ph -> ( x e. R -> x e. Ring ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> x e. Ring ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` x ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_idrhm | |- ( x e. Ring -> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) e. ( x RingHom x ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) e. ( x RingHom x ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 13 | 2 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( RngCat ` U ) = C |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Id ` ( RngCat ` U ) ) = ( Id ` C ) |
| 15 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> U e. V ) |
| 16 |  | #P_incom | |- ( Ring i^i U ) = ( U i^i Ring ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ringssrng | |- Ring C_ Rng |
| 18 |  | #P_sslin | |- ( Ring C_ Rng -> ( U i^i Ring ) C_ ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ph -> ( U i^i Ring ) C_ ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_syl5eqss | |- ( ph -> ( Ring i^i U ) C_ ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 21 | 2, 12, 1 | #P_rngcbas | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` C ) = ( U i^i Rng ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 3, 21 | #P_3sstr4d | |- ( ph -> R C_ ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> x e. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 24 | 2, 12, 14, 15, 23, 9 | #P_rngcid | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> ( ( Id ` ( RngCat ` U ) ) ` x ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_rhmsubclem2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R /\ x e. R ) -> ( x H x ) = ( x RingHom x ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> ( x H x ) = ( x RingHom x ) ) |
| 27 | 11, 24, 26 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. R ) -> ( ( Id ` ( RngCat ` U ) ) ` x ) e. ( x H x ) ) |
